K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-12: lha min nang na'ang ma rungs las byed pa; ;sor phreng khyod ni shin tu cher dkris shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-13: sdig pa sems pa mi yis spangs pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-14: ma ni 'jig rten dag na dka' mchog byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-15: nyon mongs des ni zla bcu rum na bsrel de nas phyis ni btsas par gyur nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-16: bshad gci mang reg sdug bsngal myong bas gsos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-17: ltos shig sor phreng khyod kyi gtso mo ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-18: mig ni khrag gi mchi mas rab tu gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-19: bud med bu la byams shing sdug pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-20: mngar gyi bum pa phrag la thogs te 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-21: rgan mo nyon mongs rlung gi skra yang bshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-22: gos ngan ral po rlung gis bskyod cing 'brul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-23: lus la rdul gos rkang pa ser ka byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-24: rgan mo nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po myong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215a-25: lus bskams yun ring rlung dang lhags pas nyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-0: sdug bsngal mang pos shin tu gdungs @215b par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-1: bud med de ni rnam par snying myos te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-2: bsam yas sdug bsngal ldan zhing kyi hud 'bod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-3: de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-4: bdag gi bu sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis phan tshun lan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-5: yang lan gyis rgya zhing cher rtsod pa las bdag gi bu pham ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-6: lag cha bor bar mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-7: sdug pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos reg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-8: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-9: bcom ldan rin chen gter stor ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-10: bdag gis nyon mongs myong bas rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-11: bdag gis mig tu gyur pa thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-12: mig gi rdul rnams bdag gis bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-13: bdag gi bu ni mi khrag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-14: kye ma lus dang zas la reg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-15: kun tu 'khyams shing mtshon rnon thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-16: 'gro ba mang po'i phung po gsod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-17: bdag gi bu yang mgu bya zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-21: 'gro mang tshig rtsub mnyan mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-22: de la sogs pa rnam pa du mar smre'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-25: khyod kyi gtso mo ni shing drung na 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-26: de lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i bud med 'di la khyod ral gri thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-27: bdag gi ma mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas bsad par 'dod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:215b-29: chos ma yin pa'i phung po la chos su nor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-1: ka'i dbyar zla ra ba'i dus la smig rgyu ba la chu yin snyam nas ri dvags rnams kun tu 'khyams pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-3: khyod kyang slob dpon ngan pa'i man ngag gis rmongs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-4: chos ma yin pa la chos su sems pa'i sems can ni mnar med pa zhes bya ba'i mi bzad pa chen por 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyabs su myur du song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jigs pa med pa'i 'byung gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-12: sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang mtshungs par gzigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-13: na ba rnams gso ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-14: skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-15: sangs rgyas ni dbye gnas na bzhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-16: rtsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-17: sangs rgyas ni dbul po rnams kyi mi zad pa'i gter ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-18: sangs rgyas ni lam stor ba rnams la lam bzang po ston pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-19: sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams kyi skyabs su gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gru zhig pa rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-21: mtshon rnon po myur du bor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-23: bsnyen par rdzogs pa longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216a-24: song la bla ma'i rkang pa la gtugs te bzod pa gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-0: rgan mo nyon mongs ma la rab tu 'byung bar thongs shig @216b ces gsol ba thob la srid pa mi zad pa las sems can rnams sgrol cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-1: sho gam bzang po rab tu dbyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-2: bsnyen par rdzogs pa sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-4: khyod yun ring por lam ngan par 'khyams shing ngal bar gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-7: khyod kyang sho gam len pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sho gam len pa yin te; sor mo'i phreng ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sho gam len pa lam sel gyi rgyal po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-10: sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral cing lam sel /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-11: rtag tu sho gam len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-12: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas de nyid du srin po ltar shin tu rno zhing mi bzad pa'i mtshon rnon po bor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-13: byis pa lo gcig lon pas me mdag blangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-14: me mdag de bor nas rang gi lag la nyug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-15: dus te cho nges 'debs pa de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba'ang mtshon shin tu rno ba de bor nas ngu zhing cho nges btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-16: mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba'i sor mo'i phreng ba thogs pa'ang rang gi lus las phud nas kyi hud ces zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-18: mi zhig nyal ba las rang gi rkang pa la sprul gyis zin ma thag tu myur du sad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-19: lag pa bskum pa las sprugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:216b-20: shin tu mi bzad pa'i sbrul bzung nas 'dor ba de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba'ang rang gi mgo las sor mo'i phreng ba myur du bor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-0: @217a *// ji ltar bdag nyid gdon dang bral bar gyur par shes nas ngo tsha ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-1: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-2: bdag nyid mngon par rig nas me tog rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba'i kha dog ltar khrag gis lus thams cad yog cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-3: sprin chen po ltar mig mchi mas gang nas rab tu ngu zhing bdag la rdeg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-4: ji ltar sprul gyis zin nas smyos pa'i mi sprul ltar ltos 'phye zhing 'gro 'gro ba de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba'ang tshad shing sum cu rtsa dgu khor khor yug gi sa la ltos 'phye zhing song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo la bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-7: kye ma sangs rgyas byams pa'i mchog mnga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-8: skyes gdul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-9: gti mug chos kyi rlabs chen mi shes chu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-10: rgya mtsho che las bdag deng nges par bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-11: kye ma sangs rgyas thugs rje mchog mnga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-12: skyes gdul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-13: shing rtsa 'bras bu lo ma mang ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-14: dgon pa las ni deng bdag nges par bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-15: kye ma sangs rgyas dga' ba mchog mnga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-16: skyes gdul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-17: lta ba sna tshogs ri mor bris pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-18: stag gi lag nas bdag deng nges par bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217a-19: kye ma sangs rgyas btang snyoms mchog mnga' yang dag gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-0: skyes gdul kha lo @217b sgyur ba bdag gi slad gshegs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-1: 'o dod 'bod dang cher 'bod mnar med pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-2: sems can dmyal chen gting nas deng bdag bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-3: 'di ni skyabs med pa yi skyabs lags te; ;rtsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-4: bdag gis yang tshe ba'i las bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-5: bdag ni 'di 'drar gyur la skyabs mdzad gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la slar bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-8: khyod longs la myur du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-9: ma'i rkang pa la gtugs la bzod pa gsol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-12: bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol cig ces gsol ba thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-13: de nas sor mo'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung nas langs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-14: rang gi ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang; rang gi ma la lan mang du bskor ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-15: chu srin byis pa gsod ces bya ba bzhin du 'gre zhing dus nas cho nges btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-16: rang gi ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so; ;slob dpon ngan pa'i dbang song bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-17: mi stong dgu brgya bkum lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-18: kye ma bdag gis mi bzad bgyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-19: bdag gis sdig phung mang po rnyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-20: ma khyod bdag gi rten lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-21: sangs rgyas shin tu skyabs su gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-22: khyod kyi zhabs ni mgor bzhag ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:217b-23: rab 'byung bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-0: de nas mas rang gi bu la tshigs su bcad @218a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-2: ngas ni bu khyod btang zin gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-3: rang byung 'jig rten pha rol spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-4: bdag kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-5: de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-6: kye ma bcom ldan bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-8: sangs rgyas bdag gi bu sgrol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-9: 'jig rten kun la thugs kyang brtse //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-10: mgon po khyod kyi gzugs rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-11: yon tan dpe yang 'gro la med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-12: bdag gis cung zad brjod nus te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan mo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-15: khyod kyi bu ni nga mdun du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-16: rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-17: legs so bud med nyon mongs ma //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-18: rgyun mi 'chad par bde bar shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-19: khyod ni rab tu byung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-20: dus las shin tu yol zin gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-21: dge bsnyen ma yi chos rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-22: rgan mo bdag nyid dbugs phyungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-23: skad cig tsam du 'dir sdod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-24: rgyal po gsal rgyal ji srid na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-25: 'di dag tu ni mthong gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-26: de tsam du yang bde bar 'dug ///
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-28: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-29: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas bskor cing mdun du bdar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218a-30: snang ba chen pos mnyan du yod pa'i yul thams cad snang bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-0: @218b sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis mi ltar 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-1: cang shes ltar 'thab pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-2: rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-3: sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-4: kye ma mi 'dul kha lo sgyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-5: sangs rgyas nor la bzang po mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-6: kye ma 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-7: sor mo'i phreng ba rab tu btul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-8: rtag tu mi yi khrag gis lus byugs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-9: lha min dbang dang lha dang srin po dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-10: gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rtsal chen dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-11: klu dang sha za lto 'phye mi 'am ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-12: stobs ldan rtsal chen nam mkha' lding dag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-13: sems can gtum po stobs ldan gzhan dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-14: sor phrang ming thos nyal bzhin mig btsums 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-15: de 'dra gtum po'i las byed sor phreng de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-16: mi yi rgyal po tsam gyis ga la sod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-17: de ni btsas ma thag tu de yi tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-18: lha dang lha ma yin pa kun skrag na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-19: mi yi rgyal po tsam lta ci zhig smos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-20: ming gis go cha mtshon kun rdol cing snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-21: de ltar drag cing stobs ldan rtsal che ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-22: kye ma de bzhin gshegs kyis btul ba legs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-23: mthu dang rtsal kyang bsam gyis mi khyab mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-24: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-25: yul dang ye shes spyod yul bsam mi khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-26: sor mo'i phreng ba de ring mdzes par snang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-27: shin tu gzugs bzang btso ma'i gser ltar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:218b-28: nyi ma'i zer shar kha dog lta bur mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-2: tshul khrims bral ba'i mi ni yong mi mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-3: kye ma bdag deng khyim chos mang thob snyam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-4: sor mo'i phreng ba chos gos stsal par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdag la thugs brtse bzhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-6: sor mo'i phreng ba dge sbyong tshul 'dra stsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-7: slong ba kun gyi rgyal po chen po la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gzigs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-9: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-11: nga'i lha'i gos mchog 'di khyod kyi chos gos gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-12: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-13: sbrang ma lta bu khyod su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-15: ma dad pa'i sbyin pa nga len nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-17: khyod ni 'dod pa'i gong bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-18: khyod kyis da dung chu klung mang po ma brgal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-19: rang bzhin gyis gcer bus gzhan la ji ltar gos sbyin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-20: khyod ni rang bzhin gyis gcer bu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-21: chos gos kyi phyir ji ltar rin thang med pa'i gos gzhan la sbyin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-23: rgyal po'i gyad stong thub pa bdag nyid lus thams cad thog mar 'gyel na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-24: ba lang rgan po 'dam du song ba bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219a-25: ma brgal ba nyid du 'gyel bas rgan po gzhan gyi gyad stong thub pa la ji ltar brgal bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-0: de bzhin du ngas kyang khyod kyi rin thang med pa'i gos gyon na brgya byin mig stong can nyon @219b mongs pa'i bdud bye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-1: rang bzhin gyi bdud la sogs pa dang ji ltar 'gyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-2: ngas ni bdud mtha' yas pa dang 'thab cing nyon mongs pa mang po zad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-3: dge sbyong gi chos de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la spyad par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-4: khyod kyi mal cha ni de ltar gnas par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-6: khyod ni lha rnams kyi dbang phyug ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-7: khyod ni dmus long du gyur pa dang khyad par med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-9: khyod kyis gtum po'i las kyi sdig pa ci 'dra ba'i bye brag mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-11: gtum po yin par sbrang ma lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-13: brgya byin gyis gsal bar gtum po'i las mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-14: bstan pa'i tshul shes na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa thog mar rin thang med pa'i gos gyon na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-15: dge sbyong ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-17: khyod ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dben pa tsam yang mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-19: khyod ni bstan pa las phyi rol tu gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-25: nor bu zla mdzes la sogs pa'i rin po ches gang ba'i bum pa brgyad khri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-27: rin po che'i bum pa gzhan yang dpag tu med pa spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-28: mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du rin thang med pa'i gos bor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:219b-29: gang dge sbyong gi chos la nges par byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras thu bo /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-2: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyis bsdams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-3: lus kyis brtul zhugs spyod pa'ang ci'i phyir rin thang med pa'i gos mi gyon /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-5: sha'i ro'i kha zas spangs te; sha med par brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la yang dag par spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-6: khyim nas khyim du rgyu zhing lkugs pa ma yin par lkugs par 'du shes pas mdun dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-9: yod ces zer na'ang gnas brtan chags par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-10: bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-11: bum pa re res kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dge sbyong rnams nam 'tsho'i bar du bza' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-15: bdag gir bya ba spangs shing btang nas yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-18: slong ba la sogs pa'i gter zad mi shes par byas pa de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-21: til tsam gyi bag sogs pa de'ang dge sbyong gi chos ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220a-24: nor rnam pa mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220b-1: de bzhin du nyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220b-2: 'tshong ba de ni dge sbyong gi chos dang mthun pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220b-3: de dag ni khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi nor lta bu yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220b-15: ji ltar skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams kyi yan lag gcad par bka' stsol bar 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:220b-21: brgya byin bstan pa'i phyi rol tu gyur pa zhing pa lta bus ga la shes /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:221a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:221a-3: nyan thos kyi gsod pa ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:221a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:221a-11: brgya byin khyod la dri ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:223b-20: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po la slar 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:223b-22: khyod srin bu phra mo bzhin du mchod zhing 'khyam du gar 'gro /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-0: blun po la la zhig nags kyi nang du song nas mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na shing gi rtsa ba'i steng na srin bu me khyer gyi phung po mthong @224a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-2: ngan pa de skrag nas grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-4: 'brog tshig go zhes zer ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-5: 'gro ba mang po der dong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-6: mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na srin bu me khyer mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-7: 'di me ma yin no zhes mthar gyis slar log ste dong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-9: khyod kyang sor mo'i phreng ba blun po'o zhes ston cing bdag nyid dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-12: sems can mang pos kyang shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-13: blo gros 'chal pa blun po la la zhig nags khrod du song nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-14: shing mya ngan med pa'i nags me tog rgyas pa mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-15: me yin pa snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-18: 'gro ba mang po'ang de bzhin du phyin pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224a-26: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis snang ba chen po phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-0: sor mo'i phreng ba la mchod pa @224b chen po byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-2: sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-3: kye ma skyes bu stag gi 'thab mo mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-4: don dam brgal zhing lan ldon shin tu mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-5: kye ma ston pa mi 'dul kha lo sgyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-6: de phyir mtha' yas stobs 'dzin sangs rgyas lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-7: zhabs mchog padma lta bur mnyen zhing 'jam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-8: rdul gyis mi reg pa la phyag 'tshal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-9: lan mang skyabs mchis de bzhin gshegs pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-10: gsol ba bdag gi lhung bzed sor phreng stsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-11: sor mo'i phreng ba dang mdzes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-12: nam mkha' la ni zla ltar mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-13: sor phreng tshul khrims yon tan dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-14: brtul zhugs gzi brjid rdzogs pa mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-15: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la slar smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-16: sbrul lta bu 'jig rten skyong ba phra mo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-17: khyod su dag cig 'jig rten skyong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-19: nga rgyal gyis khengs pas bdag gis lha'i lhung bzed spyin no zhes nga la 'drid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-20: yi dvags ltar 'jungs pa dag yud tsam gzhan gyi tshe nga'i ya nga ba dag ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-21: gyo mo'i snod ni su la'ang mi dgos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-22: 'jig rten gyi mgon po snyam du sems pas bdag gi lha'i kha phyis nga la sbyin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:224b-23: gang 'jig rten na ma rungs pa'i ya mtshan can rnams thal bar byed pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba zhes grags te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-3: bya rog skad 'byin pa mthong nas khyu byug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-4: khyu byug ces nor ba de bzhin du khyod kyang chos su sems shing chos ma yin pa srung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-5: nags khrod na 'dug pa'i bya rog skad 'byin pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-6: khu byug snyam du sems pa bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba khyed bzhis chos skyongs la 'jig rten ma skyongs shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa cher byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-10: sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-11: sor mo'i phreng ba myur du rab tu byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-12: nga yis tshod 'dus grong zhugs bslus pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-13: sor mo'i phreng ba nga ni mi dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-14: sems can dmyal ba gting nas khyod brgal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-15: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bdud sdig can la slar 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-17: khyi rkun sbrang bu lta bu phar song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-18: khyod ci shin tu spobs par smra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-20: khyod deng myur du byung ste song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-21: ji srid du khyi ltar bcing ba lngas bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225a-22: rkang pa g-yon pas ma brdabs pa de'i bar du ni bdud khyod rab tu rtson to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-0: lung pa'i sgo thams cad kyang @225b ngas stong par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-2: nam mkha' lding ri rab kyi steng du 'dug nas rgya mtsho dpag tshad kyi bar mang po na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-3: klu phrug mthong na len pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad la'ang nga nam mkha' lding ltar rnam par rtse zhing thar pa'i khu bas ngoms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-4: rtag tu bdud sdig can khyod kyi mgo bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-5: byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu'i glang po che rnams rol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-6: bdud khyi rkun lta bu khyod cang ma zer bar chos bdud rtsi'i tshig nyon la yud tsam gyi bar du sdod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-7: chos thos nas rang gi grong khyer du song zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-9: grong khyer rnams shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-10: de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-11: sor mo'i phreng ba la lha'i mchod pa chen po byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-12: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mchog bdag gis mgos gtugs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-14: padma mchog dang 'dra ba'i bsngags brjod bstod par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-15: bde gshegs padma 'dab stong spyan mnga' 'dab stong ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-16: zhabs mchog 'jam pa padma 'dab ma stong can 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-17: zhabs ni padma dmar skya 'dra zhing rdul mi chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-18: zhabs mchog autpal 'dab 'dra phyag mthil shin tu 'jam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-19: autpal 'dab ma mchog gi zhal gyi dri bda' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:225b-20: 'jig rten dag na autpal 'dab ma bzhin du bsil //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-3: dbu skra autpal mthing ga dri mchog bsil ba 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-4: autpal mthing ga snum pa'i mdog 'dra yid du 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-5: dbu skra nyag ma phra zhing lcang lo'i phreng ba mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-6: khyod kyi tshems mchog ku mu da dang zla ba 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-7: ku mu da dang zla ba padmo'i snying po ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-8: chu dang nya lcibs dag gi skyon gyis yong mi gos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-9: tshems ni ku mud zla ba lta bur dri ma med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-10: nyes pas mi gos tshems mchog ku mud kha dog 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-11: tshems kyang nyon mongs bsal cing thabs mchog tshams mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-12: punda ri ka bzhin du dri med gsal ba'i blo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-13: punda ri ka bzhin du sems mchog dag pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-14: sems ni punda ri ka lta bur mi gos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-15: 'dod khro glen pa'i nyes spangs sangs rgyas punda ri //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-17: pad mo'i drung na autpal dri mchog mdzes pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-18: sangs rgyas deng mdzes autpal gnyis ltar sor phreng mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-19: sor phreng deng mdzes 'di ltar sdig can bdud kyang ni //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-21: lan dang yang lan dag gis de bzhin gshegs deng rol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226a-22: 'di ni 'jig rten du yang mgon po myur du 'gyur //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-0: sor mo'i @226b phreng ba 'dir 'ongs ma yang gsad par sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-1: deng zhi so so'i skye bo skal pa yod pa 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-2: bden par smra ba'i tshig ni gzhan du yong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-3: khyod kyi sdig byas ci nas lus 'di byang 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-4: de ltar sor phreng khyod kyis rtsom zhing nan tan gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-5: kye ma dpa' bo khyod kyis gtum pa'i las byas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-6: de ring chos kyi rje por gyur na bdag dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-7: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la slar 'di skad ces smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-11: dbang phyug ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-19: skyes bu mdze tshabs chen pos btab pas mdze rab tu zhi ba bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-20: 'jig rten pa rnams 'di snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-21: gang bdag nyid kyi nad zhi bar mi nus pa des gzhan gyi nad ji ltar gos snyam mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-23: gtum po mdze tshabs chen pos btab pa lta bus sor mo'i phreng ba so so'i skye bo 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-24: dgra bcom pa'o zhes pha rol gyi sems shes par ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:226b-25: sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-3: dmus long lta bu khyod yud tsam sdod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shing gang la brten te bzhugs pa'i shing de'i lha mos sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-5: dpa' bo sor mo'i phreng ba myur bar du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-6: khyod ni dur smrig rgyal mtshan gyon cig dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-7: bde gshegs thabs gcig thog mar bsod snyoms gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-8: dpa' bo 'bras bu dam pa thob par bgyi //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa bshos mi gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-11: nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-12: khyod kyi sbyin pa su la sbyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-13: myur smros bzang mo yangs pa'i mig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-14: nga yi the tshom la gor chod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-15: de nas lha mo yangs pa'i mig gis slar sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-16: sangs rgyas rtag tu bshos gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-17: nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-19: brdzun du smra ba mi cha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-20: rdzun gyi tshig ni rnam spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-21: g-yo yi bsam pa sdig can yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-22: chos gcig las ni 'das pa yi; ;skye bo rdzun gyi tshig smra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-23: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-24: mi byed pa ni ci yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227a-25: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-1: khyod kyang dma' ba'i rigs su skyes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-2: sbrang bu lta bu sangs rgyas kyis smad pa'i bud med kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid la shin tu rtogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-3: 'jig rten na rdzun du smra ba gang; 'jig rten na bden pa 'dzin pa gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-4: 'jig rten na zang zing la chags pa gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-5: 'jig rten na na zhing shi ba gang yin sbrang bu lta bus mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-6: sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po mi shes pa'i sems can de dag ni rdzun smra ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-7: sems can gang zang zing la chags pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang zang zing gis bkur pa'i sems can de dag ni brdzun du smra ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-9: de dag la rab tu 'byung ba'ang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-10: bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-11: sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag mi shes pa'i sems can de dag ni brdzun du smra ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-12: de dag la rab tu 'byung ba'ang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-13: bsnyen pa rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-14: nga ni chos gcig las kyang mi 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-15: lha mo khyod kyis ni chos thams cad las 'das kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la myur du bzod pa gsol cig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-18: bud med kyi dngos po rigs dma' ba'o zhes zer ba ci la ldem po ngag tu smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:227b-21: skyes pa yin par ji ltar shes //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:228a-3: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo de la slar 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:228a-4: rgyal po'i mal du khyi song nas ri mo byed pa'i sems can gyis mi gcig par byas pa de bzhin du lha mo khyod kyang thabs kyi chos kyi brtsebs bud med kyi dngos por bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:228a-5: 'dod pa'i yul la sems shing ri mo byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:228a-6: de bas na lha mo khyod bud med kyi dngos po spongs la skyes pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:234a-3: thams cad ma yin no snyam pa las rim gyis brtags na srog chags phra mo yin par mthong bde bzhin du sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stag rnams kyis rang gi lus la bdag gi dbyings yod par bdag nyid kyis kyang mthong ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:237b-14: da dung yang sems can gang mig rtul ba de dag ni nges par bya ka landa kar gyur pa'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:237b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mi ston pa de ni nges par mig rtul ba'i bya ka landa ka yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-0: gang sngon bong bur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs @238a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-1: pa'i snying po la mi dgos par sems bskyed pa de dag ni da dung yang dbul zhing bong bu lta bur zas rtsub po za bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-2: ma 'ongs pa na'ang dbul po gzhan gyis mngag pa'i rigs ngan par skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-3: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches shing bdag med pa la sgom pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-8: gang sngon lha ma yin lus thung dur gyur cing mche ba ring ba mi sdug pa khog pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la kha zer ba de dag ni da dung yang lus thung zhing khog pa lta bur gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-9: de dag ni nges par lha ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-10: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang khog pa lta bu thung zhing mche ba ring ba gtum po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la kha zer ba de dag ni gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-12: lha ma yin gyi rigs su gtogs pa'i sems can yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-13: gang sngon yi dvags kha nas me lce 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la smod cing 'phya ba'i sems can de dag ni da dung mchu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238a-15: yi dvags rid pa kha nas me lce 'byung ba'i srog chags su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-0: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang lus shin tu rid pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la smod cing 'phya ba de dag @238b ni; btsun pa gang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-2: nges par yi dvags kha nas me lce 'byung ba nyam chung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-3: de dag sngon yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la mi rtag par lta ba rnams mdze na par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-4: da dung yang sems can gang zhan cing mdze na bar gyur pa de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la smod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-5: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la mi rtag par lta ba mdze na bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la smod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-8: sngon gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la ma zhi bar lta ba rnams ni bong chen por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-9: da dung yang bong che zhing zhan pa de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la ma zhi bar lta ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-10: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la ma zhi bar lta ba de dag ni gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-12: bong chen po de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la sun 'byin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-13: gang sngon phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na rgud par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:238b-14: nad mang ba'i sems can rnam pa mang po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yung drung gi sku la g-yung drung ma yin par lta ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-0: da dung yang phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na rgud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yung @239a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-1: drung gi sku la g-yung drung ma yin par lta ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-2: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na rgud par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yung drung gi sku la g-yung drung ma yin par lta ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-4: de dag ni nges par gzhan ma yin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi gsal ba'o zhes sun 'byin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-5: sngon gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ther zug la ther zug ma yin par lta ba'i sems can de dag ni rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas shi ste mi rtag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-6: da dung yang sems can gang la la rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas shi ba de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ther zug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-8: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang mi rtag cing tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni ther zug gi sku la smod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-10: de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi nges par de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug gi sku la smod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-11: sngon sems can gang bu med par gyur pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mi rtag par 'dzin pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239a-12: da dung yang sems can gang bu med par gyur pa de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa la zhig par lta ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-0: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang bu med @239b pa ma rungs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhig par lta ba rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-3: de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhig par lta ba rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-4: sngon sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa pha ma phrad pa las skyes par rtog pa'i sems can de dag ni pha ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-5: da dung yang sems can gang pha ma dang bral ba de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa la kha zer ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-6: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang sangs rgyas la pha ma phrad pa las skyes par lta ba de dag pha ma med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-7: de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la kha zer ba pha ma dang bral ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-10: sngon sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-13: khrag can gyi mi'i lus so zhes rdzun zer zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-14: 'jig rten dang mthu par 'jug pa las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni 'jig rten na mi sdug pa'i skyon can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-15: da dung yang sems can de dag ni yan lag thams cad mtshang zhing kham nam pa 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa las thams cad phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:239b-16: ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang kha mi gtsang ba'i dri mi zhim par mnam ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-2: 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug pa las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-4: 'jig rten thams cad kyis spangs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-5: sems can thams cad kyi las sngar bshad pa rnams shin tu yang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-6: gal te mi'i skye gnas su skye ba thob na'ang 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-8: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-9: rang gis byas pas ma rig pa yun ring por myong zhing gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi dag nyid chen po las phyir phyogs pa de dag la dge ba yungs 'bru tsam yang rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-11: sngon gang de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la mnyes par byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-12: se gol gtogs pa'i srid du 'dzin na'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can de dag dbang po thul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-13: phyug cing rigs chen por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-14: da ltar yang sems can gang dbang po thul cing bran bza' mang po'i khyim bdag shing s'a la chen po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240a-15: bram ze'i rigs chen por gyur pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rna ba la reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par byed cing bsod nams kyi las shin tu byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-0: @240b ma 'ongs pa na'ang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-1: de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-2: mi gang bran bza' mang zhing rigs che ba'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-3: bsod nams byas pa'i sems can don dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-8: snyems pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-11: yid rno bar ldan pa dbyangs yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-16: de bzhin du dge zhing nga rgyal med pa'i sems can mig gnyid thul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-18: de la sogs pa mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-19: sa'i steng gi phun sum tshogs pa lha'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-21: 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyus nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-25: 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa g-yung drung ther zug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-27: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang 'chi ba med par thos pas thams cad 'byor cing yun ring du sra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:240b-29: sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pas rol pa yin par shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-0: gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrig pa las byung ba ma yin no zhes ston @241a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-1: pa de dag ni ye shes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-2: yon tan rnyed pa'i bsod nams kyis bu mang zhing pha ma ring du 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa sems can thams cad la yod par shes pa'i rgyus 'jig rten na bde ba'i rnam pa'i mchog rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-4: phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag par thos pas sngon byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-8: dus gsum du'ang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-10: sa'i steng gi bde ba thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la brnyas pa'i rgyus ni 'gro ba lnga'i gnas thams cad na yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-12: 'khor ba sdug bsngal bar 'khyams pa na sdug bsngal ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-13: sems can gang sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-14: sems can gang phan par ston cing bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la sems pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241a-16: sangs rgyas mang po las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos na smod pa'i sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyi sa bon bsregs shing kye ma dus gsum du bsam gyis mi khyab par mya ngan du bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-0: chos ston @241b par 'dod pas 'di ltar bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-2: yang dag pa nyid du shin tu bsngags par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'dor ba de dag ni; dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-5: gdol pa la rgyal po'i bal glang lta bur de la seng ge'i khri'ang mi 'os so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po skyes pa ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-7: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi dbyings ma skyes pa mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-8: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du bdag nyid kyis btsal kyang dbyings ma byung ba ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-10: sems can thams cad la ma byung ba'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-11: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du bdag nyid kyis btsal kyang dbyings mi rtag pa ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-13: sems can thams cad la rtag pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-14: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ther zug ma yin pa ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-16: sems can thams cad la ther zug gi dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:241b-17: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-1: cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po g-yung drung ma yin pa ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-3: sems can thams cad la g-yung drung gi dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-4: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la nad ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-6: sems can thams cad la nad med pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-7: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la rga shi ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-9: sems can thams cad la rga shi med pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-10: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'jigs pa ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-12: mi 'jigs pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242a-13: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-0: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gzhig tu rung ba ma brnyes @242b te; mi shigs pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-1: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la dri ma ma brnyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-3: sems can thams cad la dri ma med pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-4: dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-7: 'bru mar 'dres pa mi dmigs pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi dbyings kyang nyon mongs pa bye bas g-yogs mod kyi; nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-8: sangs rgyas kyi dbyings 'dres par gyur pa'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-9: dbyings kyang nyon mongs pa bye ba'i nang na 'dug mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-10: bum pa'i nang na mar me 'dug pa bzhin du bum pa bcag na mar me rab tu 'bar zhing mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par byed pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-12: yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos ni bum pa lta bu; nyon mongs pa med pa ni mar me lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-16: de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:242b-18: sgrol ba lam du zhugs pas nyon mongs pa bye 'bum pa ltar bcag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-0: phyis gdod dbyings thams cad lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhin du mthong @243a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-3: nyi ma sprin gyis g-yogs nas sa'i steng du mi snang zhing sprin las grol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-5: nyi ma sa'i steng du snang ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa bye bas khebs na mi snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-8: nyi ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa las grol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-9: sangs rgyas kyi dbyings kyi nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-11: kye ma btsun pa gang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-12: khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa lta bu la spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-13: chos kyi gtam ston mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:243a-14: sbrang bu'ang sgra 'byin na de'ang shes pa yin nam /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252a-20: de la log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chen pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252a-21: yang dag par nges pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252a-24: ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252a-25: rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gnas su ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa las mtho @252b ba'i gnas gzhan mi snang ste ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-1: dma' ba'i gnas su'ang 'dod mang las gzhan mi snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa'ang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag gi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-7: sha bye ba'i phung po'i ri rab bas che ba de bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-8: 'dod chen pa'ang nam yi dvags kyi 'jig rten du song ba de'i tshe der g-yem pa'i sems skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-9: de'i tshe myur du bud med mang po 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-11: sems tsam gyis bde ba lta 'thob par ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-12: de nas myur du bdag gi bu bza' ba'i sems skyes nas za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-13: yang las kyi sa bram ze'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-14: des slong ba rnams la'ang bu rnams byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-16: yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-17: de ltar 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:252b-18: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-0: de'i phyir mthon po'i gnas kyi mchog ni sangs @253a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-2: dma' ba'i gnas na ni 'dod chen pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-4: de ltar ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te; log par nges pa'i gang zag ni 'dod chen yin par soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-5: yang dag par nges pa'i gang zag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin par soms shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-10: myur du rab tu byung la skyabs gsum du 'gro ba zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-11: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-12: theg pa 'di ni theg chen te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-13: chags med ye shes zhes kyang bgyi; ;theg pa gcig pu skyabs gcig ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-15: chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-17: dge 'dun de bzhin gshegs kyi ming //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-18: dge 'dun nyid ni de bzhin gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-19: chos dang dge 'dun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-20: de bzhin gshegs ni thabs med skyabs dang don dam skyabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253a-22: de yi slad du de bzhin gshegs la skyabs su mchi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-0: ji ltar shing @253b kun za 'dod pas ni shing kun bza' bya zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-1: shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos ma za ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-2: 'jig rten dag na bdag la mi phan nad ni sos mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-3: 'jig rten de 'dra'i phyugs med sman pa stong gis gso mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-4: de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs btang ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-5: thabs kyis skyabs su gang dag 'jug pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-6: de lta bu yi sbrang bu gzhan med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-7: de ni sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-10: khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-11: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-12: bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-13: 'jig rten na gzhon nu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-14: bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-15: 'jig rten na dge sbyong gsal ba gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-16: 'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-18: sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-20: gang 'jig rten na skyabs gcig pu don dam pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-21: de gnyis 'jig rten na skyabs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-22: gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa mi gsal ba de dge sbyang lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:253b-23: gang skyabs gcig pu ma 'tshal ba de dag skyabs sbyor ba lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-0: gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam @254a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-1: pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thog ma nas skyabs su 'gro ba'ang ma sbyangs na dge sbyong du lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-2: de ltar skyabs su mchi ba'ang gsal bar ma 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-3: sbyin gnas su lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-5: thabs kyi skyabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de ni 'jig rten na gzhon nu mi mkhas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-8: khyod srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-9: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-10: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-11: bdag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-12: nya pa ltar srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-13: srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba ste; de dag bzung nas gang gsod pa de ni 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'dzin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-15: yang na rgyags pa bcom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-19: khyod rdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-20: bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bdag ni rdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-21: chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254a-22: bdag ni mi bden par smra ba'i chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-0: de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @254b nyid de mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-1: chos thams cad ni stong pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-2: dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang rdzun zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang mthun pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-6: bdag 'jig rten du skyes te rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas; bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-7: gzhan gyi sbyin pa'i dngos po la spyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-9: bdag gis ni rma dgu nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-11: bdag gis so shing blang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-12: bdag gis mig rtsi byug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-15: bdag gi mgo bo breg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-16: bdag mal du zhugs te nyal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-17: rked pa na bzhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-23: bdag ni shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-24: ji tsam du thabs kyis bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-25: 'jig rten na thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongs su spyod pa'i bar du rdzun smra ba'i tshul khrims mi spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-26: de kho na'i chos bden pa'i chos rab tu bshad kyi nga las nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-27: btsun pa moonggal gyi bu chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:254b-28: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-11: de kho na las skyes pa'i sku; de ji ltar ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-12: de bas ni mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa thams cad ni mi bden pa dang bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-14: de bas na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-16: ba lang rdzi dag be'u shi ba'i pags pas be'u ltar byas te brid nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-17: be'u gzhan len du 'jug pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-18: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang zhing spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-19: sangs rgyas ni 'on pa lta bur gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-22: ba ltar 'on pa rnams kyang bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa'ang 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-23: bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o snyam ste shin tu dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bor 'gyur ro snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-25: chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid bskul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255a-27: gal te be'u dngos po slar bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-2: ba lang rdzis be'u gsob bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-3: rtsva spar gang byin nas mi bden pa'i chos la dul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-4: de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i sku; 'jig rten du bstan du zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-5: sku de sus mthong bar nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-6: ji ltar ba la rtsva'i chang pa ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar byed pas chos rnams bden pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-7: de bas na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yan lag gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-8: gang gis sems can rnams chos la rtsom par sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-9: de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-10: de'i phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-11: ji tsam du sems can thams cad mi bden pa yin pa de tsam du bdag kyang rdzun smra ba spang ba'i chos mi 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-12: de'i tshe bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-15: khyod chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig ;de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-16: chang spong ba yi tshul khrims bdag mi 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-17: chang las myos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-18: chang 'thungs pa ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-19: 'gro 'chag rtag tu rab bde chang zhes bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:255b-20: bde gshegs snying po theg pa che las skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag brten ther zug ces //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-3: rab tu dga' ngoms ha ha legs brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-4: phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-7: khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-8: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-9: bdag ni 'khrig pa spangs pa'i khrims mi 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-10: rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med g-yem chags 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-11: ba dan lta bur smad tshod khyim na spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-12: bud med kun gyi drung du'ang rab tu chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-13: ting 'dzin ro ni bdag gi chung ma ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-14: chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bud med chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-15: dpa' zhing bden la dga' ba bdag gi bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-16: snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-17: stong pa 'di ni bdag gi khyim lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-18: mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa bdag gi mal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-19: nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi g-yog lags te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-20: zas ni ldam ngag gsang ba bstan pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-21: bdag gi skyed mos tshal ni gzungs rnams te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-22: byang chub yan lag me tog dag gis brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-23: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-24: bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni sdong po lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256a-25: de la sogs pa khyim gnas rtse dga' mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-0: byis @256b pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-1: 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-4: khyod ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-5: de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-6: bdag ni ma byin len spong khrims mi 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-7: gzhan nor rku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-8: ma byin pa ni byang chub lags zhes bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-9: de ni sus kyang su la'ang ma stsal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-10: byang chub shing drung bcom ldan bzhugs nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-11: khyod kyis rnyed pa med cing bshig pa'ang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-12: de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-13: de ni bla na med pa'i chos lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-15: 'o na sor mo'i phreng ba; khyod gar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-16: rol mo spangs pa'i tshul khrims zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-18: bdag ni gar mkhan bzhin du rtag tu gar bgyid de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-19: dri za'i dbyangs snyan sgrog cing glu blangs bro brdungs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-20: legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-21: legs brjod gar bgyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-22: me sbyin lta bur sgra snyan theg chen mdo sde bklag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:256b-23: mi'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rnga bran dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:257a-2: sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchod bgyid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:257a-3: de dag 'jig rten du ni kho mor ming gcig par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:257a-4: phyi dus sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pa gsung //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-4: lta ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-6: mi rung ba thams cad spong ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-12: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-16: zang zing la mi brkam pa dang /
