K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-33: 'jam par smra ba dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:292b-34: nyon mongs pa chung ba bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-1: nyan pa la bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-3: snyoms las med de ldang zhing bag yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-4: bslab pa la mos pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-5: mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-7: yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-8: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-14: 'od dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-15: bud med dang 'grogs pa spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-16: gnyen gyi khyim nas ring du lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-17: gtse ba de dang des sdig pa'i dge sbyong thams cad la 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-18: thos ma thag tu lus kyi spu langs par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-19: srog chags thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-20: mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-21: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-22: yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-23: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-26: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bye brag shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-27: mdo sde shes pa la bkur sti byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-29: 'dul ba ma yin pa'i bye brag shes te; mi 'chab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-30: de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la mkhas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs pa shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293a-32: 'jig rten gyi phyir 'brang bar bya ba shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-0: @293b de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid du shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-9: mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-10: byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-11: mtshan nyid bzhi bcu po de dag dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-12: lus dran pa'i chos dang ldan pa de gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' gsar zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-13: gang la yon tan bzhi bcu med de phyed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-14: phyed kyi'ang phyed yod pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-15: rigs kyi bu mor rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-16: byang chub sems dpar brtsi bar mi gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-17: de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o; ;de la yon tan gyi mchog gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-18: g-yem pa'i 'du shes med cing rmi lam na'ang khu ba mi 'byung ba de ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i mir rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-19: byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad kyi yon tan gyi mchog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-21: sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bshad pa'i don ci /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-23: gal te sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-24: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:293b-25: sems can thams cad kyis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-4: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-5: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad byar rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-6: gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la yod na gang gi tshe bsgral zhing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-7: gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-8: thams cad kyis kyang mtshams med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-9: 'dod chen pa'i las bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-10: gal te sems can thams cad la bdag gi dbyings yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-12: las kyi rnam par smin pa la bdag gi dbyings med pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-15: thams cad la bdag med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-17: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-18: nyon mongs pa bye bas g-yogs nas bum pa'i nang gi mar me bzhin du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-21: 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu gcig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de ring nas lo bdun na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-22: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294a-24: nga yang zhag bdun na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lung bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-0: 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu de rab tu @294b dga' ba skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-1: bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-2: gdon mi za bar 'gyur snyam nas dga' ches te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-3: rang gi ma la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-12: stobs chen por bya'o zhes thams cad bsres te zos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-13: dus ma yin pa tsam gyis shi nas bdag nyid shi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-14: bdag nyid kyis nyams par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-15: ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdzun gsung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-16: de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin; 'on tam de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-17: bsod nams rnam par smin pa med dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-19: de sngon las ngan pa bgyis pas gum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-23: de ni dus ma yin pa'i tsam bab pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-24: sngon las ngan pa byas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-25: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lung ston pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-26: des sngon las byas pa mi mkhyen par lung bstan re skan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:294b-27: de ni sngon las ngan pa byas pas shi ba ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-0: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bdag la yod pas de nyid sgrol bar 'gyur gyi sdig pa bya'o snyam ste sdig pa @295a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-1: byas na de ci bdag gi dbyings sgrol bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-3: 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu ltar dbyings yod kyang mi sgrol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-5: de nyid bag med pa mang po dag bag med pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyis mi sgrol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-6: ci sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dbyings med dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-7: sangs rgyas kyi dbyings ni rgyal thabs kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin sems can thams cad la yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-8: sangs rgyas rdzun gsungs pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-9: sangs rgyas ni rdzun gsung ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-10: sems can rdzun smra ba rnams bag med par myos shing bstan pa thos nas kyang de dag rang gi nyes pas sangs rgyas thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-12: sems can thams cad la sngon bgyis pa'i las ma mchis zhes bgyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-14: mdo sde las yod ces 'byung mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-15: thos pa tsam gyis grangs med pa'i yang grangs med par byas pa'i las rnams zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa mang po nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-18: 'jig rten gyi phyir dam bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-19: bdag grol nas sems can thams cad dgrol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295a-20: bdag brgal nas sems can thams cad bsgral lo zhes de ltar dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od kyi @295b gzi brjid kyis las byas pa ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-8: nyes pa rnams ni ji tsam du nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du 'jig rten la sgrib kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-9: nyi ma shar ma thag tu se gol gtogs pa srid kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-10: de bzhin du sdig pa'i phung po grangs med par byas pa'ang mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du sems can thams cad 'khor ba bye bar kun tu 'khor gyi mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma shar ma thag tu sdig pa'i phung po grangs med par byas pa'ang se gol gtogs pa'i srid kyis zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 'phyas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-15: 'di las phyi rol par gyur pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-17: mtshams med pa byas par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-18: grangs med par sdig pa byas pa de'ang thang cig tsam gyis zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-19: de ci'i phyir zhe na; gang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems ma bskyed pa'ang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-20: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam gyi bye brag gis bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-21: 'jig rten gyi phyir bdag grol nas dgrol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:295b-22: 'khor ba bye ba na gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can rnams dam pa'i chos bye bas sad par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-1: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-3: bdag nyid kyis nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad pa'i phyir rings par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-4: de las de'i lus 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-7: ngas ni mya ngan gyi zug rdu bcad pa'i lam bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa yin gyi da khyed kyis nan tan gyis shig ces ngas lam bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-9: lam bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-10: rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-13: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i lam zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-15: nga'i dbyings su ngas mi g-yo ba thob pa ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-16: bde bar gshegs pas dgongs pa'i tshul gyis nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-17: gal te ma bcad na nges par 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'phyan to zhes mya ngan gyi zug rdu bcad pa'i lam ngas bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-18: mya ngan ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-19: zug rdu 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296a-20: bdag gis nyon mongs pa bye ba gzhom pa ni sman pa ltar skyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-0: bkru ba @296b dang; brtol ba'i don byed pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-1: khyed kyang rang bzhin gyis nga la bsnyen bkur gyis shig dang ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-2: da khyed kyi nan tan gyis shig ces bya ba de ni dgongs te gsungs pa'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ston pa'o zhes bya ba'ang skye ba 'di chod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-5: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni au dumba ra'i me tog bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-6: dad pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gser gyi gram bu bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mnyes par byed pa ni rus sbal zhar ba gnya' shing gi bu gar 'jug pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mdo sde 'di'i don med par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-10: 'tsho ba'i 'bras bu yod par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-11: bdag nyid srid pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-12: nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad las sgrol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-13: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ston pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-14: bsod nams la g-yel ba byed kyang sdig pa la yid mi dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-15: ngas nyan thos kyi theg pa las bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-18: de ltar shin tu rnyed par dka'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-19: 'jig rten na dpe med kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la myur du ltos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-20: de ltar gyis shig pa'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:296b-21: sdig pa la yid mi dga' ba zhes bshad pa de'i don ci /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-2: sems ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-3: dge slong rnams mi dge ba'i grogs po'i sten gyi nyes pas dri ma lnga la sogs pa'i dri ma mang pos mdun du byas shing bskor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-4: dri ma lnga la sogs pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-9: gnyid dang gsum ste; rgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-10: the tshom de lnga ni sems sun 'byin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-11: dri ma lnga la sogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-12: dri ma mang po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-13: sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i dbang du brtson par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-14: rings par rings par zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du mdo sde spong bar ma gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-15: ji tsam du 'dod chen par ma gyur pa de tsam du bdag nyid bsgral ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-16: tshig de'i don ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-17: sems bzhin du nyon mongs pa glo bur gyi dri ma bye ba rtsa ba nas brko ba ni rings par rings pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-18: yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-19: yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-20: yid ni rab tu dang ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-21: byed pa dang ni smra ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-22: de dag bde dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-23: grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297a-24: nyan thos kyi theg pa las yid ces bya ba bstan pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i don te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-0: yid rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bya ba de @297b gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-1: de ni chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-2: chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-3: yang yid rab tu dang bas byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba thams cad bcad de bdag gi dbyings bstan nas gang rab tu dang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-4: de nas phyis smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-5: byed pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thob nas gang smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-6: gang byed pa de thams cad 'jig rten rab tu sgrol ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-7: de'i tshe ji ltar mis grib ma mthong ba bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-9: de bas na grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-10: tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-11: yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-12: yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-13: yid ni rab tu 'khrugs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-14: smras pa dang ni byas pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-15: de ni sdug bsngal ldan par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-16: shing rta rab tu drangs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-17: tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni nyon mongs pa bye ba'i don no; ;yid kyang rab tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye bas g-yogs pas 'khrugs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-18: sems gang gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa bye ba'i nang du zhugs pa'i don to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:297b-20: byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyir 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-0: shing rta rab tu drangs pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'khor lo ba lang gi rjes su 'gro ba de @298a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-2: sdig pa'i phung pos 'khor ba'i 'phang lo sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-3: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su sems can rnams rab tu 'khyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-4: de bas na bsod nams la g-yel bar byed kyang sdig pa la yid mi dga' ba zhes bya ba grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-7: ba yi 'o ma la mar yod par rtogs pas mi rnams srub la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-8: ci'i phyir chu la mi rnams mi srub ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir mi rnams tshul khrims bsrung zhing tshangs par spyad pa spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-15: mi gser 'dod pa rtog pa dang ldan pa brag la rko la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-16: ci'i phyir shing la mi rko /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-17: rdo ba gser gyi dbyings yod pa la ni rko yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-18: shing gser med pa la mi rko'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-21: dbyings yod pa la rtog pa'i mi rnams bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-22: tshul khrims srung zhing tshangs par spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-25: dbyings med na ni tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-26: lo bye bar chu la bsrubs kyang snum mi 'byung ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-27: gal te bdag gi dbyings med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-28: bdag la chags pa'i tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298a-29: tshul khrims spyod pa rnams don med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-0: tshangs par spyod pa tshangs par @298b spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de'i don ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-1: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la rol pa spangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-2: sor mo'i phreng bas kyang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-4: mi mang po nges par des ltung ba'i chos su mkhyen nas 'dod pa'i 'du shes spangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-8: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-9: sems can thams cad chos kyi spun yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-10: bud med thams cad ni sring mo yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-11: sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-12: rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-13: lha mo sgyu ma'ang lcam dral na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-16: de ni 'jig rten gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i bya bas bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-18: rgyal po'i gyad gnyis skugs stong btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-19: dam bcas pas gcig la gcig rdeg cing mi brtsams pa'i tshul gyis skugs stong 'phrog par ston pas rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-20: 'khor thams cad dga' bar byed na 'gro ba rnams kyis de'i bye brag mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-21: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thabs byas te yab yum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-22: bdag nyid skyes bu brtan por ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-23: de nas phyis 'gro ba mang po'ang srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi bzad pa las sgrol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:298b-24: sems can rnams kyis de'i bye brag mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-0: rol mo la 'dus pa'i nang du skyes bu gar mkhan gar @299a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-1: byed cing gar dang tam gyi tshigs su skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-4: 'gro ba mang po myur du mgu bar byed pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag gi lus gar mkhan chen po lta bur lus bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-6: sems can bye ba mang po sgrol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-7: sems can rnams kyis skyes bu'i thabs su mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-8: 'di lta ste; rol mo la 'dus pa'i dbus su sgyu ma byed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-9: bdag nyid rnam pa mang por gcod cing rtse bas 'gro ba mang po dga' bar byas pa'ang snang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-11: de bzhin du sgyu ma byed pa ltar bdag nyid sems can mang po la phan par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid sgyu ma sprul pa ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-14: 'jig rten kun la legs par rab tu gzigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-15: thog ma med pa tshun chad 'khor bar 'pho zhing 'khyams pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-17: sring mor ma gyur pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-21: tshe rabs bye ba mang por 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni gar mkhan bzhin bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-22: de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs par spyod pa mdzad do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299a-23: bam po bdun pa ste tha ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-0: rang gi dbyings dang lhan cig @299b tu 'dod pa'i rtsed mo byas pa gang cung zad bde ba rang gis bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-2: bdag nyid ma ning du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-4: sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-5: bud med la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-7: bdag nyid kyis bzung nas smra ba bzhin du ci rung bar 'gyur rnam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-8: de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni dbyings gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-9: tshangs par spyod pa brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-10: bdag nyid gzhag par mi 'gyur ba'i gan du de bzhin gshegs pa phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-12: ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas dge bsnyen pha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-13: dge bsnyen ma thams cad tshangs par spyod pa la rab tu ma bkod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-14: ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-17: dge slong ma rnams ni ka ba bzhi pa'i khang pa lta bus dam pa'i chos kyi rgyur dpe bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-18: sdig pa chen po'ang rab tu 'byung bar gda' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-19: ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-20: dge bsnyen ma dag de ltar sdig pa rab tu gda' bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-21: ci'i slad du'ang dge bsnyen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-22: dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis 'dul ba'i chos bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:299b-26: 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi ming du btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gnas la bkod kyang sgra gcan 'dzin gyi tshul @300a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-3: 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyang tha dad pa de dri ba 'di ni mi dri ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-5: sems can thams cad kyi dbyings yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-6: srog gcod pa spangs pa ni sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-8: ji ltar bdag gsod pa ltar 'jig rten na srog gcod pa'ang de bzhin te; bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'joms pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-11: ci'i slad du sgra gcan 'dzin bzhin du mtshungs par gzigs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-12: bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'chang ba skyon chags pa ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad cing bsad par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-15: de skad ma zir cig ;de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgra gcan 'dzin dang mtshungs par gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-18: skyes bu chos 'dod pa zhig bdag nyid dus gnyis su za ba las la la zhig gis bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-19: zas lan gcig par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-20: srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu gsod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-21: ji ste de ltar gyur na de dag la srog gcod pa dag par mi 'gyur ro; ;gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300a-23: shin tu bde ba 'dod pa'i bde ba de las phyir phyogs pa'i 'phags pa 'dod pa 'joms pa ni bdag gsod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-0: gal te 'phags pa @300b rnams de ltar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-1: bdag gsod pa'i sdig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-2: gal te 'dod pa'i sems bskyed cing gzhan gyi drung du gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-3: bdag 'dod pa'i sems skyes na ji ltar bya zhes ma zer cig ;de las ngo tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-4: nga'i lus gcig yod kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-5: med kyang dpa' bo ltar 'dug pas bdag gsod pa ni bdag gi khams 'joms par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-7: de ni bsod nams kyi phung po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-12: nyon mongs pa'i dug gi phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig ni skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can dam pa'i chos 'jig pa rnams bdag gi nyon mongs pa mi zad pa ltar de bag med par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-15: tshul ma yin par gnod pa'ang byed du 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-16: de dag ni bdag la mchod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-17: ji ltar bdag sdug par 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-21: bdag spong bar 'dod pas skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan rnams chad pas gcod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rig pa yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-23: ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i slad du sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:300b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-1: bar 'khor ba'i tshe rabs de dag la sems can thams cad mar ma gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-2: sring mor ma gyur pa gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-3: khyir gyur pa'ang par gyur te; 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni bro mkhan bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-4: de bas na bdag gi sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-5: gzhan gyi sha'ang sha gcig pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-6: sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-9: sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-10: dbyings gcig tu gyur pa'i sha za bar 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-11: sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-16: dar gyi srin bu la sogs pa rang gi dbyings kyi sha ma lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-20: sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lus spangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-21: sangs rgyas ni zang zing med pa yin na chags pa'i rdzas ci la'ang bsten pa de ni gnas ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-22: zang zing la bsnyen pa ni thabs kyi chos nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-23: 'di rdzas gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa la bsnyen par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-24: rdzas gang nas 'byung ba de dang der bsnyen bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301a-25: gsod pa'i lag ma yin par gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa ni bsnyen du rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-0: tshong 'dus gcig na lham mkhan gyis ko ba @301b las lham drubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-2: gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa de bzhes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-4: gal te ma he rang chos bzhin du gsum nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-5: ma he bdag po gdol pa las ko ba blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-6: lham mkhan btsal nas lham du drubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-7: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na de gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-9: ma he chos bzhin du shi bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-10: ma he bdag pos lham drug tu bcug nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin na blang bar bya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-11: 'on te ma blangs na dge slong dang mthun nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-12: snying rje med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-13: tshul khrims ral bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-15: rmo brko yang bgyir mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-16: chu mi gtsang bas btsos pa'i zas kyang mi blang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-17: de lta lags na dge slong dag de lta bu gda'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-19: de ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-20: gal te dge bsnyen yod na ni zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-21: skom chu gtsang ma dang sbyor cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-22: gang na dge bsnyen yod par rmo brko mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-23: gang na dge bsnyen med pa der sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-25: chu'i nang na'ang srog chags yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:301b-26: nam mkha' la'ang srog chags yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-0: gal te de ltar rnam par dag @302a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-1: pa grub pa rnams la sdig par mi 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-2: rnam par dag pa grub pa de dag ji ltar rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-3: de dag 'jig rten na mi 'dri ba zhes bya ba'i dri ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-6: 'jig rten pa'ang ring zhig tshun chad bdag nyid sha za ba la mi gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-8: gang 'jig rten pa la sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang mthun pa yod pa de'ang thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-10: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang thar pa brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-11: de dag la thar pa med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thar pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-13: de dag la'ang rab tu 'byung ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-14: de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-16: 'jig rten pa la'ang sha za ba ni bdag nyid za ba'o zhes brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-17: de'ang bdag nyid bdag nyid kyi sha la mi za ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni bdag nyid kyi sha za bar nges so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-20: 'jig rten du ya mtshan can thams cad byung ba mdo sde 'di la bstan pa nyan 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-0: sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba grangs med pa'i bskal pa bas kyang ches grangs med @302b pa; bskal pa yangs pa bas kyang ches yangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-1: dpag tu med pa bas kyang ches dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa ko san ta bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du grong 'dir byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-3: de'i tshe ya mtshan can med cing ya mtshan can gyi ming yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-4: sems can theg pa chen po bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-5: sems can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-6: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lo mang du zhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-7: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa'ang lo mang du gnas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-8: dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-9: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-10: chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-11: dge slong sangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig dgon pa na gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-12: dge slong de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gcig gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-13: rin thang med pa'i gos byin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-14: dge slong des rjes su bzung ba'i phyir blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-15: ai shin 'dar ra ba'i drung nas phar bstan te song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-16: ai shin 'da'i mis gos de mthong nas sems bzlog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-17: nub mo mun khung na dge slong de'i thad du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-18: gos de phrogs nas ri khrod du khrid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-20: shing la lag pa gyen du dam por bcings te song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:302b-21: de'i nub mo mun khung na me tog 'thu ba'i bram ze skon pa thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-1: te; tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na stag 'dug pas skrag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-2: stag des bsad la thug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-4: bdag nyid rab tu mi dga' zhing song song na dge sbyong gcer bur bcings pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-5: kye ma dge sbyong dgon pa dur smrig can 'dir 'ongs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-6: dur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-7: lag pa bsgreng nas lus gcer bur byung la dka' thub spyad par bya'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-8: lam 'di nges par thar pa'i lam du legs par grub pa yin nam zhes dam pa'i chos gzhig pa'i phyir bdag gi gos ngan pa bor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-9: skra btogs nas mgo reg gcer bu pa'i dge sbyong du 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-10: de las dge sbyong gcer bu pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-11: dge slong de bdag nyid bcings pa khrol nas shing shun blangs te sa ser pos byugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-12: thang la 'gro ba bram ze zhig gis mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-13: sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-14: 'di ni dur smrig gyon pa'i dge slong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-16: btsag gis byugs te song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-17: thar pa'i lam ni 'di yin pa snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-19: ci zhes de kun tu rgyu bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-20: de las mur 'dug kun tu rgyu ba byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-21: dge slong phye ma red chur zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303a-22: rang gi klad pa'i rma chus bkrus nas skra 'jam pos klad pa'i rma g-yogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-0: sbrul bsad pa'i ras ba lang rdzis bor ba @303b gyon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-1: khrus byed pa de skyes bu shing 'thu ba gzhan zhig gis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-2: snga ma ltar dge slong de nyon mongs pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-3: dge sbyong 'di ni ngur smrig gyon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-4: rgyal mtshan ngur smrig gis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-5: ral pa ring por byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-6: rtsva gos gyon nas dus gsum du khrus byed pa'i dka' thub spyod pa yin du bzung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-7: de dge ba yin nam zhes 'di nyid thar pa'i lam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-8: gzhan ma yin no zhes dka' thub can du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-9: de tshun chad ya mtshan can dka' thub byed pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-10: dge sbyong de chur zhugs te rma mang po thams cad la rang gis yog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-11: rang gi lus rdul gyis gang zhing sbrang ma 'dus zhing dge slong de skra 'jam bos g-yogs pa mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-13: phyugs bdag po rnams de ltar byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-14: dge slong de ba lang gi lci ba yar ke ma'i me bus te bsro ba skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-15: ba lang gi lci ba'i ril bu can thog ma de nas byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-16: dge slong de rma la sdug bsngal reg par shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-17: dpa' bo ltar 'dug pa skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis snga ma bzhin du mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-18: ngur smrig gyon pa ni thar par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas ci legs par 'gro'am snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-19: mi g-yo ba'i sar 'gro ba thar pa yin snyam du bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:303b-20: mi g-yo ba'i sa mya ngan du 'gro bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-0: de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du @304a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-1: gyur pa rnams kyang so so nas der lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-3: ci lta ba mthong nas log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-7: phan tshun du ri dvags su mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-8: ri dvags gsad snyam du bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-9: gcig la gcig gsod pa de bzhin du ya mtshan dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang de ltar byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-11: dbyar zla ra ba ri dvags rnams smig rgyu ba la chu yin snyam du bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-12: 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi las gzhan du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-14: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-16: bya ba'i mchog thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-17: dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na de lta bu byung na chos nub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-19: de bzhin du bdag gi de kho na 'di 'dra de 'dra'o zhes log par lta ba bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-23: 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ldem po ngag mi shes pas bdag med pa sangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes mur 'dug byung ba ltar rnam par rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304a-24: rjes su dpag pas tshugs pa'i 'jig rten pa la'ang gti mug gi chos kyi dbang du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa la'ang ldem po dag tu bshad pa mi shes pas shes pa nyams @304b te; de'i phyir phyogs gnyis spangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-1: bdag tu gtogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-3: dge 'dun gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dbu ma'i lam du bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-4: dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-5: sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-6: dbu ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam gzhan du rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-9: mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-10: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la smod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-11: sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-13: phyogs gang du mdo sde la smod pa ji snyed 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-14: 'dod chen pa ji snyed 'byung ba bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-15: phyogs gang du sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba ston pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-17: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul gyi dbus 'dir mdo sde la smod pa'i sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-18: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-19: shar phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:304b-20: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-0: lho phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag @305a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-2: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag drug cu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-3: nub phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-4: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-5: byang phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-6: 'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcu 'byung ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-7: kha che'i yul du'ang nga'i bstan pa glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-9: bha ru ka tsar yang nga'i glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-10: ri bhin dhya la'ang de bzhin no; kha che yul gyi dge slong rnams bsgrub pa'i don mi shes nas theg pa chen po thams cad la smod pa 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-11: nga la skur pa de ji lta bya zhes pa'ang ngo tsha ba skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-12: lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-13: nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dngos po chen po brgyad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brtan pa'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-18: nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-20: dge bsnyen dang; dge bsnyen ma rnams nan tan snying por byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305a-21: nga'i bstan pa khur du thogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-0: @305b lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-4: lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga'i bstan pa lo du ma zhig gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-5: khyod lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi srog btang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-8: de de bzhin gshegs pa g-yung drung ngo zhes sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rgyal po'i srid chen po mi bzhed cing khur chen po thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-11: stong gsum pa rnams bsgral lo zhes bskal pa bye ba mang por bsgral ba de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyang bskal pa bye ba mang por nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-12: nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-13: dam pa'i chos kyi khur khyer bar mi 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-15: khyod lta bu'i dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-16: dam pa'i chos kyi khur chen po khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-17: bdag gis dam pa'i chos phrag la bskur ro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:305b-19: gling phran thams cad kyi sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-3: g-yung drung yin no zhes rang gi srog kyang btang ste rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-4: sems can rnams yid ches kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-5: mi ches kyang rung nga'i lus bsad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-7: gdod bdag gi lus rtag pa'i skur 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-8: khur khyer ba rab tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-9: nga'i nyan thos de lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-10: khyod la sogs pa sems can bye ba mang po yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-11: de'i phyir lho phyogs kyi rgyud rab tu bsngags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-12: nga'i chos tha ma der ston par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-14: gzi brjid kyi dzambu gling gi skye bo ma lus par 'dzom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-16: nga rgyal gyi rgyus nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro; ;'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-18: rgyal po dag rgyal po gzhan gyi khrims byas pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-19: bdag nyid kyang skye dgu skyong ba de bzhin du kha che'i yul gyi 'khor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-20: yul bha ru ka tsa ba rnams kyang ngo tsha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-21: nga rgyal bskyed nas theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsang ste ston par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-22: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-26: sog khur gyi phung po'i nang du me bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-27: sog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshig pa'i lhag ma lus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306a-28: mtha' 'khor mi tshig pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-0: @306b dang po nga skyes pa'i sa na nan tan lhur byed pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-1: tshig pa las lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-2: mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i sa der byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas dam pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur ba der rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-3: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i g-yog mang po dang bcas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-5: lha'i mchod pa chen po byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-8: bdag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung zhing rjes su gtad par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-9: sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'di'i ming bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-13: mdo sde 'di'i ming sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-15: mdo sde 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu rnyed par dka' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:306b-16: au dumba ra'i me tog bzhin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-5: ras phran ka tam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-6: yul ba lang gi ras dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-16: bud med 'dod pa'ang thams cad kyi mchog sbyin no zhes bsgrags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-17: de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ming tsam gyis zham ring ba la gtogs so cog skrag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-18: gcig kyang phyir ma byung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-25: de nas btsun mo'ang kyi hud 'bod cing sdig can de'i gan du ma bzhud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-27: gzhan gyi yul 'khor rnams ni ma mchis kyang mi mang ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:308b-36: lo rtsi ba rnams kyis de ring sor mo'i phreng ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:310a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin @310a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-1: 'jam pa'i zhabs la bzod par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sor phreng mtshon 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-3: bram ze'i gzugs kyis bdag cag don phyir gshegs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-4: sangs rgyas sku mdog 'bar ba deng 'dir gshegs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-5: dpal ldan gzi brjid mthu mnga' bzod par gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-6: tshig gis mngon du gsung ba mtha' yas sku //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-7: khyed ni yang dang yang bying mang po yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-8: yang dag sangs rgyas skyabs byed skyabs su gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-9: gnyen med rnams kyi gnyen du gyur pa khyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-10: sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'das pa gnyis mdzes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-11: 'di ni chos spyod shin tu ngo mtshar rmad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-12: mi las pad mo skye ba ngo mtshar bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-13: 'jig rten sangs rgyas gnyis ston mchog de 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-18: byang phyogs logs su gangg'a'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na; 'jig rten gyi khams rtag par rab tu dga' ba sdug cing mos pa zhes bya ba de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-20: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de ni nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312a-21: rang sangs rgyas thams cad med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-0: theg pa gcig las @312b theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-4: bde ba thams cad dang rab tu ldan par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-5: sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-11: rtag tu dga' zhing mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-14: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyar te rjes su yi rang ba bar byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-17: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-18: sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis kyi ming gang gis thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-19: de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-20: sems can de dag gi khyim nyid du dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-21: ngan 'gro rnam pa bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro; ;de gnyis kyi ming thos nas phyi rol pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-23: mtshams med par gyur pas 'phya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-29: tshigs bcad kyi phyir yang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:312b-30: de dag gis ngan 'gro bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-0: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di gnyis @313a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-1: kyi ming gis bsrung bar byas na dgon pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-2: 'jigs pa'i dus thams cad du'ang bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-3: phyis 'jigs pa thams cad kyang bsrung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-4: 'jigs pa byung ba thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-11: she zas kyang mi tshugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-12: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-13: sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni che ba'i bdag nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni de lta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid glang po che 'di gnyis la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-18: sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma'ang ma brjed par gsos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-19: ngas sor mo'i phreng ba'i lag nas de'i ma rgan mo thar bar byas te sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis mam bsad cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-20: bsad pas mtho ris su mi 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-21: ral gri thogs te 'ongs nas skad cig de nyid la de'i bar du 'dug pa ni chos la gzhug pa'i thabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-22: de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313a-23: de bzhin gshegs kyis sgyu ma sprul pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-0: sems @313b can mang po dag gis mi shes te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-1: sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i rgyal po sku che zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi sku mnga' 'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-4: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-5: de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-8: de ci sgyu ma lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-12: sprul pa'i mas ji ltar smras pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgyu ma'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-14: de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mkhan po nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshig 'di zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-16: wa 'dre yun ring zhig tu mdza' bor byas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-17: des seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra 'dzin par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-18: wa 'dre yang thos pa tsam gyis 'chi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-19: yang ci wa 'dre de dom gyi skad du 'byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-20: seng ge'i rgyal po chen po sgra skad 'byin pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-22: dom gyi sgra skad du'ang nga ro mi 'byin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-24: de bzhin du wa 'dre lta bu bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu'i mkhan po byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-25: yun ring mo zhig tu lhan cig 'khod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad 'dzin lta ga la nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:313b-26: gal te 'di thabs ma yin na de'i rtsal gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-0: yi dvags lta bu bdag gi glen pa'i chos la sbyor ba @314a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-1: dang; nyan du gzhug pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni glen pa'i chos mi spyod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-3: spyod pa'ang thams cad la bu gcig pa lta bu'i byams par spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa sgyu ma mang po ni sems can bye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-4: bram ze'i mkhan pos mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-5: sangs rgyas nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma mkhyen te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas ni sgyu ma'i rgyal po'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-7: mkhan po'i chung ma dga' byed mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-9: sems can 'di bram ze'i bu mo 'jo ma'i dku mthong yang sangs rgyas kyi che ba yin par mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-10: ji ltar tsan tsa sgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis sgyu ma sprul ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-11: de bas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bdag gis bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-12: gdol bas khyed la bsnyen par mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-13: rgyal po sems can mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-16: mdun du 'dug pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-17: de ltar mis mi'i drung du bstan par mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-18: lha dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstan par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bsgyur bar lta ga la nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314a-27: lha ma yin tshad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-0: nam mkha' lding gis @314b de la gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-1: gal te 'di lta bu'i sems 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyang sdig byed pa rnam pa mang po ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can 'di lta bu'i sdig ma rungs pa byed pa 'byung ba dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma chen po'i thabs kyis sku ston to zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-4: de nas yang rgyal po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-12: de'i sgyu ma gsum gyis smras pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-13: nga'i sgyu ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam pa de gsum du sprul pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-14: sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba'i phyir sor mo'i phreng ba de ltar byon pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-17: bdag gis dgung bdun nas sbyin pa chen po stsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i phreng ba lho phyogs logs kyi sbyin gnas su gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-24: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-25: sgyu ma'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:314b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' chen thabs kyi sku //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-1: nyid rab tu phun sum tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-2: thabs mchog dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-3: thabs kyis dbyings rnams su yang 'jog par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-4: thabs kyis sprul pa dag ni yongs su ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtha' yas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-6: blo gros mtha' yas grags pa'ang mtha' yas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid mtha' yas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-8: bde gshegs mtha' yas mtha' yas stobs chen ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-9: gsang ba mtha' yas mtha' yas dgongs dag ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-10: 'jig rten rab tu snang mdzad mtha' yas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-12: yon tan mtha' med grangs las shin tu 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-13: de bzhin gshegs ni mtshungs med dpag tu med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-14: chags med ye shes nam mkha' lta bur ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha' bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur phan zhi bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-17: sor phreng slad du bde gshegs gshegs pa ni; ;gshegs dang ma gshegs zhes kyang brjod mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-18: bde gshegs sgra gcan zin ltar snyoms par gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-19: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-23: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315a-25: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-0: mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal @315b gyis de dag thams cad kyang sor mo'i phreng ba'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-1: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-3: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de yi rangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do; ;shin tu rgyas pa'i lung theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-6: me tog au dumb'a ra ltar rab tu rnyed dka' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-7: 'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so;; ;;rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya pra bha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-8: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dharma t'a sh'i la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-013:315b-9: rgya'i lo ts'a ba bande to da a'a tsarya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
